T02D2219:50a-2: shin tu gnas pa'i ye shes nyid //
T02D2219:50a-5: de la khyab pa yod ma yin //
T02D2219:50a-6: g-yo zhing phyogs gcig la gnas pa //
T02D2219:50a-8: gang zhig kha dog med gyur chos //
T02D2219:50a-10: mtshon dang dug dang med dang chus //
T02D2219:50a-11: gnod pa skyed par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2219:50a-12: nam mkha' kun nas gnas bdag nyid //
T02D2219:50a-13: mi 'gyur mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste //
T02D2219:50a-14: nyon mongs med cing 'gyur med la //
T02D2219:50a-15: rnam pa thams cad dus kun la //
T02D2219:50a-16: gang zhig dus kun pa min pa //
T02D2219:50a-17: de yang kun mkhyen 'gyur ma yin//
T02D2219:50a-18: de bas dus rnams kun du yang //
T02D2219:50a-19: 'gyur ba min par shes par bya //
T02D2219:50a-20: lus can dag ni thams cad la //
T02D2219:50a-21: ye shes che gnas nyid yin na'ang //
T02D2219:50a-22: mi shes rab rib kyis khebs pa'i ;
T02D2219:50a-23: / byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so //
T02D2219:50a-24: ji ltar khyi ni bong pa las //
T02D2219:50a-25: bsnyeg cing 'phen par byed la min //
T02D2219:50a-26: de bzhin sems kyis gang bsam bya //
T02D2219:50a-27: snyeg gi sems nyid la ma yin //
T02D2219:50a-28: gang zhig sems kyis bsam bya yang //
T02D2219:50a-29: de nyid la yang nges rtog gi / sems nyid de nyid ji 'dra zhes //
T02D2219:50a-31: ye shes grub pa las de nyid gnas pa gzhag pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o /
T02D2219:50a-33: // / shin tu rmongs pa'i 'jig rten rnams //
T02D2219:50a-34: gal te gzhan gyis rab bskul na //
T02D2219:50a-35: thar pa'i don du bdag gis bdag /
T02D2219:50a-36: g-yang sar yang ni 'dor bar mdzad //
T02D2219:50a-37: rmongs par gyur pa mang po yang //
T02D2219:50a-39: bde gshegs lam ni kun spangs te //
T02D2219:50a-40: dmyal ba'i lam ni brten pa snang //
T02D2219:50a-41: long ba'i mi ni la la zhig / gzhan dag la ni lam ston byed //
T02D2219:50a-42: gang dang gang brtags de dang de //
T02D2219:50a-44: gal te rmongs pa'i dbang gis lam //
T02D2219:50a-45: mi mthong de ni ston byed kyang //
T02D2219:50a-46: sdig can gyi ni lam de yis //
T02D2219:50a-47: bgrod pa nyams pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D2219:50a-48: rang nyid kyis lam mi mthong bar //
T02D2219:50a-49: ji ltar shin tu gzhan bdag 'dren //
T02D2219:50b-1: gnyi gas sdug bsngal the tshom med //
T02D2219:50b-2: ji ltar dmus long bya ba yis //
T02D2219:50b-3: 'brog dgon dag tu zhugs gyur pa //
T02D2219:50b-4: gnyis ka'ang de 'dra la la zhig / ji ltar grong du 'jug par 'gyur //
T02D2219:50b-5: de bzhin dmus long gyur pa des //
T02D2219:50b-6: yang dag ye shes ma mthong bas //
T02D2219:50b-7: gnas de thob par mi nus na /
T02D2219:50b-8: ji ltar de ni gzhan grol byed //
T02D2219:50b-9: de bas bla na bsten pa ni //
T02D2219:50b-10: yang dag dang ldan sleb ma yin //
T02D2219:50b-11: yongs su brtag par bya'o zhes //
T02D2219:50b-12: rgyal ba'i mchog gis rab tu gsungs //
T02D2219:50b-13: dkon mchog gsum la ngang gis dang ;
T02D2219:50b-14: / sems can kun la snying rjer ldan //
T02D2219:50b-15: brtan zhing gtong sogs yon tan ldan //
T02D2219:50b-16: bsod nams thams cad cher bskyed la //
T02D2219:50b-17: byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed //
T02D2219:50b-18: blo bzang rab dang yon tan ldan //
T02D2219:50b-19: khro ba med cing spro ba che //
T02D2219:50b-20: zab mo'i chos la lhag par mos //
T02D2219:50b-21: de ni chos kyi sbyin pa dag / zang zing med la rtag par dga' //
T02D2219:50b-22: de ni rtag tu 'dod pa chung //
T02D2219:50b-23: tshogs gnyis yang dag bsags pa'o //
T02D2219:50b-24: de ni bla mar sangs rgyas dang //
T02D2219:50b-25: rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun gyis gsungs //
T02D2219:50b-26: de nyid sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D2219:50b-28: gang gzhan bla mar bshad pa dag / log shes mngon pa'i nga rgyal can //
T02D2219:50b-29: chag sogs don du chos rnams ni //
T02D2219:50b-30: mchog dag ston par byed 'gyur ba //
T02D2219:50b-31: 'gro ba'i sdig pa'i grogs po ru //
T02D2219:50b-32: 'jig rten na de rab tu gnas //
T02D2219:50b-33: bdud kyi phyogs kyi rigs can te //
T02D2219:50b-34: bdag gzhan phung bar byed pa yin //
T02D2219:50b-35: 'gro ste rtag tu sbang bya zhing //
T02D2219:50b-36: de la bsnyen bkur bya ba min //
T02D2219:50b-37: de la khong khro mi bya zhing /
T02D2219:50b-38: shin tu nye bar mi bya'o //
T02D2219:50b-39: ji ltar nyan thos thos rnams dang ni //
T02D2219:50b-40: lhan cig bde gshegs bzhed min ltar //
T02D2219:50b-41: de bzhin de 'dra dang lhan cig //
T02D2219:50b-42: gnas par shin tu mi bya'o //
T02D2219:50b-43: ye shes grub pa las slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o /
T02D2219:50b-45: // / sngar bshad pa yi mtshan nyid las //
T02D2219:50b-46: slob dpon du ni bshad pa yin //
T02D2219:50b-47: slob ma yi ni mtshan nyid kyang //
T02D2219:50b-48: ji ltar gyur pa bshad par bya //
T02D2219:51a-2: skya ba 'dzin la legs slob na //
T02D2219:51a-4: gzhan du pha rol bgrod mi 'gyur //
T02D2219:51a-5: de bzhin bla ma dkon mchog gsum //
T02D2219:51a-6: byang chub sems la'ang dang ldan zhing //
T02D2219:51a-7: 'jig rten la ni snying rjer ldan //
T02D2219:51a-8: 'di ni gru zhes bya bar bshad //
T02D2219:51a-9: bla ma mkhas pa skya ba 'dzin //
T02D2219:51a-10: gru ni thams cad rab ston pa //
T02D2219:51a-12: rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin //
T02D2219:51a-13: skya ba 'dzin pa med par ni //
T02D2219:51a-14: gru ni pha rol bgrod mi nus //
T02D2219:51a-15: yon tan thams cad rab rtogs kyang //
T02D2219:51a-16: bla ma med par srid mthar min //
T02D2219:51a-17: de bas nges pa nyid du 'di //
T02D2219:51a-18: brtul zhugs brtan pas de bzhin du //
T02D2219:51a-19: phyi nang bdag nyid can rnams kyis //
T02D2219:51a-20: rtag tu rnal 'byor pa mchod bya //
T02D2219:51a-21: phyag la sogs pa'i bya ba kun //
T02D2219:51a-22: dus rnams kun du rab tu bya //
T02D2219:51a-23: shes rab dad par yang dag ldan //
T02D2219:51a-24: skye bo rnams la snying rjer ldan //
T02D2219:51a-25: khro ba med cing slu ba med //
T02D2219:51a-26: gtong sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D2219:51a-27: spro chen rang gi brtson 'grus ldan //
T02D2219:51a-28: rtag tu bla ma'i bka' bzhin byed //
T02D2219:51a-29: ma bsgoms yang ni rang gi blos //
T02D2219:51a-30: yo byad la sogs dngos po rnams //
T02D2219:51a-31: ci snyed pa dang ci nus dang //
T02D2219:51a-32: de bzhin bza' dang bca' sogs dbul //
T02D2219:51a-33: ji ltar brnyas pa gyur kyang ni //
T02D2219:51a-34: yid ni zhum pa med par bzod //
T02D2219:51a-35: lung dang rigs pa rtogs pa po //
T02D2219:51a-36: slob ma yon tan kun ldan yin //
T02D2219:51a-37: mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin can //
T02D2219:51a-38: gang yang 'dri ba med pa ni //
T02D2219:51a-39: slob par bya ba mi nus zhes //
T02D2219:51a-40: sangs rgyas nyid kyis rab tu gsungs //
T02D2219:51a-41: ji ltar byis pa 'dam gong la //
T02D2219:51a-42: ji dga' bar ni 'phen pa ltar //
T02D2219:51a-43: de bzhin gang zhig gzhan dbang 'gyur //
T02D2219:51a-44: dam pa'i chos kyi snod ma yin //
T02D2219:51a-45: ye shes grub pa las slob ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o /
T02D2219:51a-47: // / yang dag de nyid ji lta bar //
T02D2219:51a-48: rig par bcas pas sngar bshad pa //
T02D2219:51a-49: de nyid rgyud kun la gnas pa //
T02D2219:51a-50: de rnams las ni cung zad bshad //
T02D2219:51a-51: 'jig rten na ni rkun ma'i sgra //
T02D2219:51a-52: 'bras chan don du ston par byed //
T02D2219:51a-53: la la rkun ma nyid la smra //
T02D2219:51b-0: @51b rgyud kyang de dang 'dra ba yin //
T02D2219:51b-1: sems can phan mdzad sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D2219:51b-2: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma la //
T02D2219:51b-3: yi ge de dang de yis bstan //
T02D2219:51b-4: chos ni de nyid gsung bar mdzad //
T02D2219:51b-5: de nyid 'ba' zhig gsung ba dang //
T02D2219:51b-6: de bzhin la la tshig gnyis dang //
T02D2219:51b-7: dbang po zhen pa 'ga' la chos //
T02D2219:51b-8: 'ga' zhig gsung gi gzhan du min //
T02D2219:51b-9: dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa las //
T02D2219:51b-10: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba //
T02D2219:51b-11: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
T02D2219:51b-12: stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa //
T02D2219:51b-13: byang chub sems zhes bshad pa yin //
T02D2219:51b-15: thog mtha ma med ces bya ba ni skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa ste /
T02D2219:51b-17: gzugs can ma yin pa nyid dang /
T02D2219:51b-19: dus thams cad pa nyid du yang ston te /
T02D2219:51b-21: gzugs can dang 'gyur ba dang dus rgyun chad pa
T02D2219:51b-22: rnams ni rnam par 'jig pa yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D2219:51b-23: // gal te gzugs can ma yin pa rnams kyang
T02D2219:51b-24: yul na gnas par 'gyur na 'jig pa nyid du
T02D2219:51b-25: // 'gyur te / dper na gla rtsi la sogs
T02D2219:51b-26: pa dri zhim po rnams ni gzugs can ma yin
T02D2219:51b-27: na'ang yul na gnas pas gla rtsi la sogs pa'am
T02D2219:51b-28: // 'gyur te / / des bsgos pa'i rdzas rnams
T02D2219:51b-29: med na rnam par 'gyur bas 'jig par 'gyur ro
T02D2219:51b-31: ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad glo bur ba
T02D2219:51b-32: yin pa'i phyir rab tu zhi ba'o //
T02D2219:51b-33: sngar bshad pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa na /
T02D2219:51b-34: de nyid dngos dang dngos med zad pa'i gtso bo ste /
T02D2219:51b-35: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad
T02D2219:51b-36: kyi don rnams rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir gtso bo'am
T02D2219:51b-37: bdag po'o // stong dang snying rje mi phyed pa //
T02D2219:51b-38: zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ngo bo nyid
T02D2219:51b-39: med pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2219:51b-40: kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'i stong nyid de
T02D2219:51b-41: dang / thugs rje chen po mi phyed cing gcig
T02D2219:51b-42: tu gyur pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni snying
T02D2219:51b-44: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal po 'di nyid la rab tu gzhag par bya zhing /
T02D2219:51b-45: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis phan gdags par bya'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i bsam pa'o//
T02D2219:52a-1: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pa'i rnal
T02D2219:52a-2: 'byor pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang
T02D2219:52a-3: / lhan cig phan tshun khyab pa dang khyab par
T02D2219:52a-4: byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis gnas shing sangs rgyas
T02D2219:52a-6: sems can thams cad la thugs rje chen pos gces
T02D2219:52a-7: par 'dzin par rtog pa byang chub kyi sems rdo
T02D2219:52a-8: rje zhes bya ba'i don to /
T02D2219:52a-9: 'dis ni sgom pa yang de ltar bya'o zhes ston pa yin no //
T02D2219:52a-10: byang chub sems zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2219:52a-11: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ma lus pa rnams las dgongs pa 'di nyid yin no //
T02D2219:52a-12: las dang po pa rnams la yang byang chub kyi
T02D2219:52a-13: sems ni sems can thams cad bla na med pa
T02D2219:52a-14: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhag par
T02D2219:52a-15: bya'o zhes bya ba ni sems yin par gsungs so
T02D2219:52a-17: sangs rgyas kun zhes bya ba ni //
T02D2219:52a-20: gzugs can rnams ni thog ma dang tha ma med
T02D2219:52a-21: pa mi srid pas sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi
T02D2219:52a-23: de rnams kyi 'dres pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes te /
T02D2219:52a-24: rdo rje 'chang ba nyid yin par ston gyi gzhan
T02D2219:52a-25: du na gzugs kyi sku ji ltar 'dres par 'gyur
T02D2219:52a-26: ; rdul phra rab tsam gyi tshad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'dres na yang /
T02D2219:52a-27: nam mkha' yang rab tu gang zhing de bas lhag par 'gyur te /
T02D2219:52a-28: thams cad kyi sgra ni ma lus pa'i tshig yin pas nyung dus kyang 'dres par mi rigs so //
T02D2219:52a-30: bskyed pa yi ni rim nyid dang /
T02D2219:52a-31: de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba //
T02D2219:52a-32: yang dag ye shes de nyid de //
T02D2219:52a-33: ma bcos pa zhes bya ba nyid //
T02D2219:52a-34: de nyid las ni yang dag bshad //
T02D2219:52a-35: gang gis thog mtha' med pa'i dngos //
T02D2219:52a-36: rnam dag yid kyis sgom byed pa ;
T02D2219:52a-37: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2219:52a-38: le'u dang po las de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di
T02D2219:52a-39: thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo
T02D2219:52a-40: rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to zhes gsungs pa
T02D2219:52a-42: ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la //
T02D2219:52a-43: dngos po med de sgom pa'ang med //
T02D2219:52b-0: @52b nam mkha'i tshul du sbyor ba yis //
T02D2219:52b-1: dngos po 'di dag rab tu bsgrags //
T02D2219:52b-3: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i / gzod nas dag pa mkha' dang mtshungs //
T02D2219:52b-4: byang chub med cing rtog pa'ang med //
T02D2219:52b-7: le'u dgu pa las rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste /
T02D2219:52b-8: dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ste /
T02D2219:52b-9: chos thams cad nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o //
T02D2219:52b-10: chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i khams na'ang mi gnas /
T02D2219:52b-11: gzugs kyi khams na'ang mi gnas /
T02D2219:52b-12: gzugs med pa'i khams na'ang mi gnas 'byung ba chen po bzhi la yang mi gnas so //
T02D2219:52b-13: rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyang de ltar rjes su rig par bya'o //
T02D2219:52b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni don gyi dbang de lta bu mkhyen cing /
T02D2219:52b-15: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad do //
T02D2219:52b-16: rigs kyi bu de ltar nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pas /
T02D2219:52b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag rjes su rig par bya'o //
T02D2219:52b-18: rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na gtsub shing
T02D2219:52b-19: dang gtsub stan dang mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen
T02D2219:52b-20: gyis du ba rab tu byung zhing me chen po
T02D2219:52b-22: me de yang gtsub shing la yang mi gnas gtsub stan la yang mi gnas /
T02D2219:52b-23: mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la yang mi gnas so //
T02D2219:52b-24: rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2219:52b-25: thams cad kyi dam tshig dang 'gro ba dang 'ong
T02D2219:52b-26: ba la sogs pa rjes su rig par bya'o //
T02D2219:52b-28: lus ngag sems rnams bsgom pa ni //
T02D2219:52b-29: rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa //
T02D2219:52b-30: gang la 'ang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid //
T02D2219:52b-31: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bsgom //
T02D2219:52b-33: nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam gyur cing //
T02D2219:52b-34: rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid //
T02D2219:52b-35: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la //
T02D2219:52b-36: rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom //
T02D2219:52b-38: rdo rje thig ni gdab pa dang //
T02D2219:52b-39: tshon rtsi dag kyang dgye ba ni //
T02D2219:52b-40: sngags kyi sems dpas mi bya ste //
T02D2219:52b-41: byas na byang chub rnyed par dka'o //
T02D2219:53a-1: pa dang chon rtsi dgye ba la sogs pa mi bya'o //
T02D2219:53a-2: sngags kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni yid skyob
T02D2219:53a-3: par byed par bya ba'i phyir sngags ni ye shes
T02D2219:53a-4: yin te / yang dag pa'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2219:53a-5: gal te rmongs pas de ltar byed na ni byang chub rnyed par dka' bar 'gyur te /
T02D2219:53a-6: byis pa'i skye po las dang po pa'i sems can
T02D2219:53a-7: gyi bya ba byed pas sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo
T02D2219:53a-8: rje 'dzin pa nyid rnyed par dka' bar 'gyur ro
T02D2219:53a-10: yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par dbang bskur
T02D2219:53a-11: ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa de la ni
T02D2219:53a-13: 'jug pa dang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa ni bkag pa yin no //
T02D2219:53a-14: rdo rje sems dpa'i snang ba yis //
T02D2219:53a-15: rang rang ngo bo gsal bas na //
T02D2219:53a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang //
T02D2219:53a-17: rnam snang mdzad du de bshad do //
T02D2219:53a-18: skye bo mi 'dod pa kun dang //
T02D2219:53a-19: log shes slob dpon skye bo yis //
T02D2219:53a-20: mi bskyod pa yi ngo bo pas //
T02D2219:53a-21: 'di ni mi bskyod yang dag bshad //
T02D2219:53a-22: gang phyir nges par sangs rgyas sogs //
T02D2219:53a-23: rin chen rnams ni rang 'byung nyid //
T02D2219:53a-24: ye shes sems can don ldan pas //
T02D2219:53a-25: rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bshad do //
T02D2219:53a-26: mi gnas pa yi mya ngan 'das //
T02D2219:53a-27: srid dang mya ngan 'das ma gos //
T02D2219:53a-28: grangs med yon tan yang dag ldan //
T02D2219:53a-29: 'od dpag med par de bshad do //
T02D2219:53a-30: sems can kun don bya ba rnams //
T02D2219:53a-31: rang nyid kyis ni rang bsgrub pas //
T02D2219:53a-32: don yod ye shes chen po ste //
T02D2219:53a-33: don yod grub pa zhes bshad do ;
T02D2219:53a-34: / phra ba dang ni rgya che'i tshul //
T02D2219:53a-35: 'jig rten gsum po yongs su mkhyen cing //
T02D2219:53a-36: zhing rnams kun na gnas gzigs pas //
T02D2219:53a-37: des na spyan zhes bshad pa yin //

T02D2219:60a-2: sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad na /
T02D2219:60a-3: thams cad thugs rje'i bdag gnyid can //
T02D2219:60a-4: bdag la bka' drin mdzad du gsol //
T02D2219:60a-5: thog med dud nas 'di bar du 'ang //
T02D2219:60a-7: yang dag ye shes ma mthong bas //
T02D2219:60a-8: sdug bsngal rnams kyis rtag tu dub //
T02D2219:60a-9: ji ltar ye shes kye 'gyur bas //
T02D2219:60a-10: gang gi ye shes mchog thob nas //
T02D2219:60a-11: sems can kha lo bsgyur 'gyur pa //
T02D2219:60a-12: khyed kyis de ltar bdag la brjod //
T02D2219:60a-13: ji ltar 'das pa'i rdzogs pa sangs rgyas //
T02D2219:60a-14: de bzhin de ltar ma byon pas //
T02D2219:60a-15: sems can don mdzad ces grags pa //
T02D2219:60a-16: de ltar bdag ni bgyid par brtson //
T02D2219:60a-17: rim pa 'di dang legs ldan pa //
T02D2219:60a-19: de ni ye shes mchog 'gyur te //
T02D2219:60a-21: / ye shes grub pa ba las dbang po 'bring po bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o /
T02D2219:60a-23: // / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor sku mdog sogs //
T02D2219:60a-24: phyag dang gdan ni rnam bsgom dang //
T02D2219:60a-25: ting 'dzin gsum dang phyag rgya bzhi //
T02D2219:60a-26: zhal gsum dang ni phyag drug rnams //
T02D2219:60a-27: sgom 'gyur de ni phyi shun bcas //
T02D2219:60a-28: sna tshogs spros pa'i man ngang rnams //
T02D2219:60a-29: de kun dman pa'i yin par bshad //
T02D2219:60a-30: de rnams la yang de bzhin thabs //
T02D2219:60a-31: de la gtan tshigs bshad par bya //
T02D2219:60a-32: mchog dang bar ma'i lam dag las //
T02D2219:60a-33: ji bzhin chung du gzhan bya ba //
T02D2219:60a-34: lha dang sngags ni rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2219:60a-35: rgyud las gsungs pa kun du bya //
T02D2219:60a-36: gang lam mnyam pa'i sems yod pa //
T02D2219:60a-37: de la ye shes skye 'gyur gyi //
T02D2219:60a-38: gzhan du bskal pa bye ba ni //
T02D2219:60a-39: brgyas kyang de thob mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2219:60a-40: kun du sems dang ldan pa yi //
T02D2219:60a-41: rtsa ba cher ldan blo gros bzang ;
T02D2219:60a-42: / sngar bshad mtshan nyid ldan pa yi //
T02D2219:60a-44: gang zhig bar mtha' gnyis po nyid //
T02D2219:60a-45: bsgom pa gsum po gtso bo bas //
T02D2219:60a-46: yang dag ye shes 'byung ba'i don //
T02D2219:60a-47: yang dag bya ba dbang du 'gyur //
T02D2219:60b-0: de nyid med par @60b 'tshang mi rgya //
T02D2219:60b-1: lam la bgyid pa de nyid min //
T02D2219:60b-2: de bas lam la gnas bdag nyid //
T02D2219:60b-3: bsgrubs na ye shes thob par 'gyur / gang zhig lam las nyams pa dang //
T02D2219:60b-4: snying rje dang bral sems ldan zhing //
T02D2219:60b-5: chags sogs don la spro dag nyid //
T02D2219:60b-7: ye shes grub pa las dbang po tha ma pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyid shu pa'o /
T02D2219:60b-9: // / rnal 'byor ba yis shes grub phyir //
T02D2219:60b-10: bdag gis yang dag shin tu bshad //
T02D2219:60b-11: rgyud kun du ni sbas gyur pa'i //
T02D2219:60b-12: gsang ba 'di ni bshad mi bya //
T02D2219:60b-13: gang la ye shes mchog gis ni //
T02D2219:60b-14: rnal 'byor mchog ni med gyur pa //
T02D2219:60b-15: lha yi gzugs ni sgom pa la //
T02D2219:60b-16: sems ni brtson pa dag tu bya //
T02D2219:60b-17: glegs bam tsam zhig bstan pa yang //
T02D2219:60b-18: sbyin mi bya bar shes bya ste //
T02D2219:60b-19: rdo rje ye shes rab spangs pas //
T02D2219:60b-21: de yi dmyal ba'i rgyur gyur pas ;
T02D2219:60b-23: de bas bdag gzhan phung ba ni //
T02D2219:60b-24: 'byung bas nges par bsrung bar bya //
T02D2219:60b-25: gzhan du ston par 'gyur na ni //
T02D2219:60b-26: dam tshig dag kyang nyams par 'gyur //
T02D2219:60b-27: rnal 'byor rgyud ni du ma ru //
T02D2219:60b-28: brtse ldan sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02D2219:60b-29: rtog pa'i dra ba rnams spangs pa //
T02D2219:60b-30: rdo rje ye shes 'di mchog yin //
T02D2219:60b-31: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa ni //
T02D2219:60b-32: lung dang rigs pa las shes bya //
T02D2219:60b-33: sgrub pa'i thabs ni byas pa la //
T02D2219:60b-34: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags pa //
T02D2219:60b-35: des ni sems can thams cad kyang //
T02D2219:60b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' mchog thob shog / dpal au
T02D2219:60b-37: rgyan nas byung ba ye shes grub pa zhes bya
T02D2219:60b-38: ba'i sgrub thabs slob dpon aindra bh'u tis mdzad pa
T02D2219:60b-39: rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan pho shraddha ka ra wa rma dang //
